events.name: Boise State Broncos at Utah State Aggies

headlines.description: Marwin Evans returned an interception 90 yards for a touchdown as time expired before halftime, and Utah State turned Boise State's seven first-half turnovers into 35 points.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Boise State-Utah State) 2015/10/16 ESHEET SC

headlines.shortLinkText: Seven 1st-half turnovers doom Boise St. in loss

events.name: Houston Cougars at Tulane Green Wave

headlines.description: Greg Ward Jr. ran for three touchdowns and threw a scoring pass to help No. 24 Houston beat Tulane 42-7 on Friday night.

video.headline: Houston crushes Tulane to stay unbeaten

headlines.shortLinkText: Greg Ward Jr. leads No. 24 Houston past Tulane, 42-7

headlines.description: Tanner Mangum threw for 252 yards and two touchdowns and BYU scored 21 straight points in the fourth quarter to beat Cincinnati 38-24 on Friday night.

video.headline: Huge fourth quarter lifts BYU over Cincinnati

headlines.shortLinkText: BYU scores 21 straight in 4th to beat Cincinnati 38-24

events.name: UNLV Rebels at Fresno State Bulldogs

headlines.description: Marteze Waller had a 38-yard rushing touchdown with 2:37 remaining to help Fresno State beat UNLV 31-28 on Friday night, snapping the Bulldogs' five-game losing streak.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fresno State scores 17 straight to beat UNLV 31-28
